Title: Dhh
Writer: Ninad Parikh (additional dialogue), Manish Saini (screenplay), Manish Saini (story), Aditya Vikram Sengupta (story), Juzar Shabbir (lyricist), Parth Trivedi (dialogue)
Actors: Naseeruddin Shah, Kahaan, Karan Patel, Kuldeep Sodha
Plot: Dhh is a heartwarming story of 3 friends (Gungun, Bajrang and Vakil) who think they are failure until The Magician comes in. All Three believe that only This Magician can help them out.
